pullRequest.title: Generate separate debug info for JIT prod builds on Linux
pullRequest.bodyText: We strip prod builds by default and there's no way to disable it without editing makefiles. This allows one to set SOLIB_STRIP in their env or pass it to make to disable this.

beforeCommit.message:
Allow user to override JIT prod build stripping

Signed-off-by: Younes Manton <ymanton@ca.ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Generate separate debug info for JIT prod builds

Rather than stripping debug info at link time for JIT prod builds,
generate a separate .dbg file like other VM modules do.

Signed-off-by: Younes Manton <ymanton@ca.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: This line (and others like it) can simply be removed.

commit.message:
JITServer specific link recipe is not required

JITServer defines SOLINK_SLINK_STATIC elsewhere as a list of statically
linked libs, but it is otherwise blank, so there's no harm in adding it
to the linker command line.

Signed-off-by: Younes Manton <ymanton@ca.ibm.com>

Emit separate debug info for JIT prod builds

On Linux and OSX, rather than stripping debug info at link time for
JIT prod builds, generate a separate artifact like other VM modules
do.

Signed-off-by: Younes Manton <ymanton@ca.ibm.com>
